IChing.title: Some Hexagrams from the I Ching

hexagram.name: Ch'ien / The Creative
hexagram.judgement: The Creative works sublime success, Furthering through perseverance.

hexagram.name: K'un / The Receptive
hexagram.judgement: The Receptive brings about sublime success, Furthering through the perseverance of a mare.

hexagram.name: Chun / Difficulty at the Beginning
hexagram.judgement: Difficulty at the Beginning works supreme success, Furthering through perseverance.

hexagram.name: Hsu / Waiting (Nourishment)
hexagram.judgement: Waiting. If you are sincere, You have light and success.

hexagram.name: Sung / Conflict
hexagram.judgement: Conflict. You are sincere And are being obstructed.

hexagram.name: Shih / The Army
hexagram.judgement: The Army. The army needs perseverance And a strong man.

hexagram.name: Hsiao Ch'u / The Taming Power of the Small
hexagram.judgement: The Taming Power of the Small Has success.

hexagram.name: Lu / Treading [Conduct]
hexagram.judgement: Treading. Treading upon the tail of the tiger.
